Articles.Content: So, when 0.20 comes out, what do you think, will the normal forum crash come or will it stay intact? Steam should take some of the load off the downloads from the site though.

The Forum won't crash as it's not even on the same server as the Store.

It hasn't been for a fair few releases, actually.
Betting now open for how long until this thread is deleted!
i don't think they delete threads that often, just lock them
IDK the past few updates have killed the Forum too, you have to remember the rush for mods as well
it depends, i have a feeling something stupid is going to happen like some elitist f*** ddosing the site just before the update. or whatever, you never know.

So, when 0.20 comes out, what do you think, will the normal forum crash come or will it stay intact? Steam should take some of the load off the downloads from the site though.

No worries sir! I have sent the fifth fleet to the evacuation zone with transports. Awaiting orders, the transports are in place above Kerbin.
I am ditching the store and switching to steam for the update, as I want to not have my broadband chugging like Edward from Thomas the Tank engine after a pub crawl.

GET TO ZE BUNKERS

Why would they delete the thread?

Edit:

i don't think they delete threads that often, just lock them

Just lawl at you signature.
There will be a bunch of new threads with users nerdgasming over new features. And posting their ungodly creations and some threads about newfound bugs. That's about all.
Well, .20 is out now so a mod can delete this.
DNS issues has nothing to do with crashes of servers.(That's what I think)

DNS issues has nothing to do with crashes of servers.(That's what I think)

not the KSP servers at least. They can be caused by crashes of the servers hosting the DNS databases.

Well, .20 is out now so a mod can delete this.

Or you could have let it die instead of bumping it back to the front page.
Don't worry, I'm from the future. The forums won't crash, but a few days later they will deep a tad. You're welcome. don't let my past self se this or we'll be destroyed by a paradox.
